channel.title: [SOLVED] Another problem.. [SOLVED]
channel.description:
Well, I wanted a Dual boot, [Ubuntu and Windows]
Well, Ubuntu boots fine, it's just Windows, I get
[code] A disk read error occurred Press Ctrl+Alt+Del to restart[/code]
How do I solve this?
I've heard it has something to do with GRUB.
[center]My friend did a command in terminal something called testdesk, or something. and it works ;D[/center]

item.title: [SOLVED] Another problem.. [SOLVED]
item.dc:creator: @Divine-Devil Divine-Devil
item.description:
@Divine-Devil wrote:

Well, I wanted a Dual boot, [Ubuntu and Windows]

Well, Ubuntu boots fine, it’s just Windows, I get

A disk read error occurred Press Ctrl+Alt+Del to restart

How do I solve this?

I’ve heard it has something to do with GRUB.

[center]My friend did a command in terminal something called testdesk, or something. and it works ;D[/center]
